import React from 'react'; import './Annoucement.css' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { Paper, TableContainer, TableBody, Table, TableHead, TableCell, TableRow } from "@material-ui/core" const FacultyAnnoucement = () => { const { val } = useSelector((state) => state.toggle); const [flag, setFlag] = useState(false); const handleClick = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); setFlag(true); } const [tableData, setTableData] = useState([{id:"1",date:"20-2-2022",time:"9:00 AM",Annby:"Hargun Singh",Ann:""}]) return (<>

Make an Announcement

Date Time Annoucement By Annoucement { tableData.map((data) => (<> {data.date} {data.Time} {data.Annby} {data.Ann} handleDelete(data._id)}>
)) }
); }; export default FacultyAnnoucement;
